snippet: A campaign with the theme “born curious” begins on Monday, with the goal of expanding circulation and generating more ads.
abstract: Advertising column; Vanity Fair begins campaign with the theme 'born curious,' aimed at expanding circulation and generating more ads.
lead_paragraph: A campaign with the theme “born curious” begins on Monday, with the goal of expanding circulation and generating more ads.

headline.main: Vanity Fair Ad Gives Life to What Killed the Cat
headline.print_headline: Vanity Fair Ad Gives Life to What Killed the Cat
